name: Raccoon Hero: The Frost
description:
Raccoon Hero: The Frost is a cute puzzle game situated in a winter wonderland forest with a goal to save baby raccoons trapped inside the ball cages!

YOUR GOAL:

Your goal in this game is to help the raccoon cubs escape their ball cages by matching their color with the color of the ball you throw at it. The babies are hidden among hundreds of other colorful balls. So basically, you need to destroy as much balls as necessary and achieve the certain score that is calculated for every level.

POWER UPS:

FIREBALL - shoots a fire ball of flames and destroys more balls at once

GRASSBALL - shoots a grassy ball that destroys more balls at once with growing ivy

AQUABALL - shoots a water ball that destroys an entire row of balls at once with a water wave

TRIPPLEBALL - shoots three balls at once



SPECIAL BALLS:

BOMBALL - a bomb ball that explodes on impact

LEAFBALL - a leafy ball that destroys nearby balls with ivy

WATERBALL - a water ball that creates a wave which destroys the entire row of balls on impact

STONEBALL - balls made of stone, unbreakable

WOODBALL - balls made of wood, breakable only in case of explosions

CRACKED WOODBALL - cracked balls made of wood, easily breakable

MISTERY BALLS - balls in a casing that hides their color


SCORE REWARDS:

There is a possibility of getting one, two or perfect three stars after finishing each level. Your level score progress is kept at the top of your screen so you can always know how close you are to perfecting it.


The number of balls you can throw is limited and it varies from level to level and therefore limits the number of your moves.

Save all the baby raccoons in each level to complete the entire quest!
